description:
30+ Meatless Meals You Can Make Now and Eat Later!
Wouldn't it be nice to have a freezer stocked full of homemade meals that are ready to go at a moment's notice? Our Guide to Vegetarian Freezer Cooking will help you do just that! We take the guesswork out of freezer cooking with these recipes that wereÂ specifically developedÂ to be prepared, frozen, and reheated later.
With over 30 meatless freezer meals, from soups to casseroles to quesadillas, this ebook will help you make unhealthy store-bought frozen foods and takeout a thing of the past.
The ebook is a PDF, so you can download it to your computer and print pages as needed, or read it on your tablet or phone.



About the Author
Nicole is the creator behind the popular plant-based food blogsÂ Oh My Veggies,Â Veg Kitchen, andÂ Delicious Everyday.
She's also a lifelong vegetarian, author of the hit cookbookÂ Weeknight One-Pot Vegan Cooking, and very busy mom!

Â What's Included?
Vegetarian Freezer CookingÂ is packed full of simple and delicious meatless meals that can be prepped ahead of time, so they're ready to go when you are! Perfect for vegetarian meal planning.
Recipes included:Â 

Black Bean Soup
Fall Minestrone
Creamy Mushroom Soup
Slow Cooker Veggie Tortilla Soup
French Onion Soup
Roasted Red Pepper & Tomato Soup
Slow Cooker Moroccan Red Lentil Soup
Chipotle Sweet Potato Soup
Slow Cooker 5-Ingredient Chickpea Chili
Lentil Shepherd's Pie
Eggplant Parmesan Meatballs
Vegetable Tamale Pie
Freekeh-Stuffed Cabbage
Nacho Mac
Pesto Lasagna Roll-Ups
Farmer's Market Tortilla Casserole
Quinoa Falafel
Roasted Veggie Stuffed Shells
Acorn Squash & Apple Ravioli
Israeli Couscous with Pesto & Oven-Dried Tomatoes
Summer Tofu Scramble
Wheat Berries with Apples, Butternut Squash & Caramelized Onions
Baked Teriyaki Tofu Bowls
Walnut & Sun-Dried Tomato Veggie Burgers
Indian-Spiced Beet Burgers
Broccoli & Sun-Dried Tomato Calzones
Thai Fresh Veggie Pizza
Chipotle Bean & Cheese Burritos
Garden Veggie Burritos
Kale & Tempeh Wraps with Peanut Sauce
Sweet Potato Quesadillas & Black Bean Quesadillas

These family friendly, make-ahead vegetarian meals are sure to make those weeknight dinners a breeze!Â 

FAQs
What format is the book in?
The book will be delivered as a PDF download. It's designed to be read on your computer, mobile device, or printed out.
Can I print the book?
Absolutely! In fact, I encourage you to print it out. Stick it in a three-ring binder, and keep it in your kitchen for easy reference.
How many times can I download the book?
As many times as you want. I lose stuff too! ðŸ˜‰
Are any of the recipes available on your website?
Some of them are available elsewhere and some of them are exclusive to this book.
What is the refund policy?
We don't offer refunds on digital products, as it unfortunately attracts fraud. But frankly, I've never been asked for one anyway. If you're not happy with the book, email me personally atÂ nicole@ohmyveggies.comÂ and I will do my best to make it right!
name: Vegetarian Freezer Cooking
